brief_summary.textblock:
The aim of this work was to investigate the healthcare professionals' knowledge about
      leishmaniasis in Divinópolis, an endemic county of Minas Gerais state, Brazil.

clinical_study.brief_title: The Healthcare Professionals and the Leishmaniasis

study_pop.textblock:
Nurses, physicians and dentists working in primary care units of the municipality,
        community health workers and zoonoses agents tied to health surveillance and veterinarians
        working in private veterinary clinics of Divinópolis city, Minas Gerais state, Brazil.

clinical_study.official_title: Leishmaniasis: the Healthcare Professionals' Knowledge in Endemic Area

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.study_design: Observational Model: Ecologic or Community, Time Perspective: Cross-Sectional
